description: Crispy battered flathead served with chips and English style mushy peas
name: Old English Fish ‘N’ Chips With Mushy Peas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 pkt 900g Birds Eye Golden Crunch Chips - Thin & Crispy
1 pkt 250g birds eye deli flathead in light batter

recipeInstructions.text: Cook frozen Birds Eye Peas following packet directions. Drain, add butter and mash.
Cook frozen Birds Eye Fish and frozen Birds Eye Golden Crunch Chips according to pack instructions. Serve with mushy peas and grilled lemon.
